title: White BBQ
content:
I don't know where I grabbed this from. I love it though. Michelle isn't as big a fan, but I love this with BBQ pork. Some day I'll post our BBQ nachos recipe. This is great drizzled on top of that.

White BBQ Sauce

a take on a Southern classic

  • 1 1/2 cups mayonaise
  • 1/4 cup white wine vinegar
  • 1 tbsp coarsely ground black pepper
  • 1 tbsp Creole mustard (you can substitute 1 tsp of dried mustard and 1 tsp of Creole seasoning, like Essence of Emeril)
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 1 tsp sugar
  • 3 cloves garlic minced
  • 2 tsp prepared horseradish

  1. Stick it all in a bowl and mix it up

  2. Refrigerate overnight for best flavor
